p: The findings in this article have been relayed to the local health authority ( Distrisalud) so that their surveillance and vector control teams can more effectively focus their efforts in the neighbourhoods which contain part of or lie immediately adjacent to these major city roads, particularly those also located in: (a) The western region of the city near the main international cargo storage warehouses, (b) the international harbour area and (c) the high SES areas within these northern areas of the city.
